word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指揭露一直隐藏或隐秘的东西，或启示超乎常人领导能力的真理。
多指揭露丑闻、坏人坏事或各种阴谋。也可指某物暴露在外。
侧重指揭露或泄露鲜为人知或保密的事。
主要指移去遮盖物，让东西显露出来。也可指揭露阴谋、秘密等。

bilingual.target: 我们需要揭露这种邪说。

bilingual.source: He decided to expose the company's corruption.
bilingual.target: 他决定揭露公司的腐败行为。

bilingual.source: The journalist went undercover to expose the corruption.
bilingual.target: 记者秘密地去揭露腐败。

bilingual.source: Some hackers claim they hack systems to expose security flaws.
bilingual.target: 一些黑客声称他们入侵系统是为了揭露安全漏洞。
我们必须揭露这个阴谋。

bilingual.source: To expose feelings is to risk rejection.
bilingual.target: 这些感觉揭露排斥的风险。

bilingual.source: I am going to expose all this humbug.
bilingual.target: 我要揭露这一切骗人的鬼话。

bilingual.source: It was correct to expose Gao Gang and Rao Shushi.
bilingual.target: 揭露高饶的问题没有错.

list.abstract: Exposé，英语单词，动词，作及物动词时意思是“揭露，揭发；使曝光；显示”。

EXPOSE

作曲：Erik Sahlen, Yoko.Hiramatsu

yingyinNormal.en: Expose that Conway is using his gun illegally and remove the weapon from his hand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 曝光康威在违法使用他的枪，将他的武器从他手中夺下。

yingyinNormal.en: A project he knew would expose his own illegal operations. At best, he lied to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他知道这计划会暴露他的非法勾当，往好了说，他骗了你。

yingyinNormal.en: In India, You squat over a hole in the train and expose your naked buttocks to the chilly air of Rajasthan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在印度，你只能蹲在车厢里的一个洞上面，把屁屁曝光在拉贾斯坦的冰冷空气中。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes? Yes. It was pity. He was too polite to send her packing in front of everyone, you see, but not wanting to expose us to the presumptuous wench any further, he took her apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？真的。他太礼貌了，所以不忍当众拒绝她，又不想我们再受这冒昧的村姑影响，所以他把她带走了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使受...的影响; 使接触

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 暴露不受保护的接触；暴露；朝向；方向；景色；景观；曝光量；经历；公布；受日晒雨淋状态

word_family.mean: v. 使暴露；使显露；暴露；揭露；揭发；露阴；使无遮蔽；使（胶卷）曝光；当众暴露自己的性器官；使…处于无保护和易受伤害的状态

sense_info_list.en: to put somebody or something in a place or situation where they are not protected from something harmful or unpleasant

examination_example.sentence: Behavioral scientists tested students' willingness to <highlight>expose</highlight> themselves to unpleasant stimuli in an effort to satisfy curiosity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 行为科学家测试了学生将自己暴露在不愉快刺激下以满足好奇心的意愿。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers examined the receipt of hugs on the participants' susceptibility to developing the common cold after being <highlight>exposed</highlight> to the virus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员研究了接受拥抱对受试者接触病毒后患常见感冒的易感性的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Subjects <highlight>exposed</highlight> to fast-food flashes also tend to think a musical piece lasts too long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接触一闪而过快餐标志的受试者们也往往会认为一段音乐持续时间的太长了。

sense_info_list.en: to let somebody find out about something by giving them experience of it or showing them what it is like
sense_info_list.zh: 使受...的影响; 使接触

examination_example.sentence: If you're failing to <highlight>expose</highlight> your child to 30, 000 words you are neglecting them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你没有让你的孩子接触到30000个单词，你就忽略了他们。

examination_example.sentence: Mr. Dunwell has begun bringing high school juniors to the factory so they can get <highlight>exposed</highlight> to its culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Dunwell先生现在已经开始把高三学生带进工厂，让他们接触工厂的文化。

sense_info_list.en: remove what is covering something so that it can be seen

examination_example.sentence: Drunks, tramps, and music hall performers might gurn and grin with a smile as wide as Lewis Carroll's gum-<highlight>exposing</highlight> Cheshire Cat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 酒鬼、流浪汉和音乐厅里的戏子也许会像Lewis Carroll笔下露着牙龈嬉笑的柴郡猫那般扮着鬼脸、咧嘴大笑。

sense_info_list.en: make public something bad or dishonest

word_usage.usage: expose作及物动词，其后可接名词或代词，如：expose the goods for sale 陈列商品以便销售。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“揭示、显示、暴露”，常指使人知道了隐藏的秘密或看到某人的品质和企图等。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使受...的影响; 使接触

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 暴露不受保护的接触；暴露；朝向；方向；景色；景观；曝光量；经历；公布；受日晒雨淋状态

word_family.mean: v. 使暴露；使显露；暴露；揭露；揭发；露阴；使无遮蔽；使（胶卷）曝光；当众暴露自己的性器官；使…处于无保护和易受伤害的状态

sense_info_list.en: remove what is covering something so that it can be seen

examination_example.sentence: In a new study, people <highlight>exposed</highlight> to jargon said they were less interested in science than others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一项新的研究中，接触行话的人说他们对科学的兴趣不如其他人。

sense_info_list.en: make public something bad or dishonest

examination_example.sentence: In October last year, a Danish TV show <highlight>exposed</highlight> H&M for burning 12 tonnes of unsold clothing since 2013.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年10月，丹麦一档电视节目曝光了H&M自2013年以来焚烧了12吨未售出的服装。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to be vulnerable or at risk
introduce someone to (a subject or area of knowledge)
sense_info_list.zh: 使受...的影响; 使接触

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重指揭露或泄露鲜为人知或保密的事。
多指揭露丑闻、坏人坏事或各种阴谋。也可指某物暴露在外。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使受...的影响; 使接触

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 暴露不受保护的接触；暴露；朝向；方向；景色；景观；曝光量；经历；公布；受日晒雨淋状态

word_family.mean: v. 使暴露；使显露；暴露；揭露；揭发；露阴；使无遮蔽；使（胶卷）曝光；当众暴露自己的性器官；使…处于无保护和易受伤害的状态

sense_info_list.en: introduce someone to (a subject or area of knowledge)
sense_info_list.zh: 使受...的影响; 使接触

examination_example.sentence: A middle school teacher during the school year, hopes he's <highlight>exposing</highlight> the students to how Chinese Americans contributed to the U. S.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位中学老师希望他能让学生们了解美籍华人是如何为美国做出贡献的。

examination_example.sentence: Research has also found that white students benefit by being challenged and <highlight>exposed</highlight> to new perspectives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究还发现，白人学生通过接受挑战和接触新观点而受益。

examination_example.sentence: Some teachers are finding ways to <highlight>expose</highlight> students to Asian-Amenican issues—if not during school hours, then outside of them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些老师正在想办法让学生接触亚裔美国人的问题——如果不是在上课时间，就在课外。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to be vulnerable or at risk
remove what is covering something so that it can be seen

examination_example.sentence: While cultural holidays are celebrated, the injustices experienced by Asian Americans are not <highlight>exposed</highlight> in elementary school classrooms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在庆祝文化节日的同时，亚裔美国人所经历的不公正现象并没有在小学课堂上暴露出来。

sense_info_list.en: make public something bad or dishonest

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重指揭露或泄露鲜为人知或保密的事。
多指揭露丑闻、坏人坏事或各种阴谋。也可指某物暴露在外。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 暴露不受保护的接触；暴露；朝向；方向；景色；景观；曝光量；经历；公布；受日晒雨淋状态

word_family.mean: v. 使暴露；使显露；暴露；揭露；揭发；露阴；使无遮蔽；使（胶卷）曝光；当众暴露自己的性器官；使…处于无保护和易受伤害的状态

examination_example.sentence: The participants <highlight>exposed</highlight> to a level of noise similar to background chatter in a coffee shop, significantly outperformed the other groups.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些暴露在类似于咖啡馆中闲聊的噪音水平下的参与者，表现明显优于其他组。

examination_example.sentence: They were randomly divided into four groups and <highlight>exposed</highlight> to various noise levels in the background.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们被随机分为四组，暴露在不同的背景噪音水平下。

examination_example.sentence: She reaches countless people with her online courses and <highlight>exposes</highlight> them to what they can accomplish on their own using animation software.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她通过自己的在线课程接触到无数人，让他们了解自己使用动画软件可以完成的事情。

sense_info_list.en: remove what is covering something so that it can be seen

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 暴露不受保护的接触；暴露；朝向；方向；景色；景观；曝光量；经历；公布；受日晒雨淋状态

word_family.mean: v. 使暴露；使显露；暴露；揭露；揭发；露阴；使无遮蔽；使（胶卷）曝光；当众暴露自己的性器官；使…处于无保护和易受伤害的状态

examination_example.sentence: Any opportunity to <highlight>expose</highlight> children to more vegetables is meaningful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何让孩子接触更多蔬菜的机会都是有意义的。

examination_example.sentence: There are some ways to <highlight>Expose</highlight> Children to Vegetables at Home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一些方法可以让孩子在家接触到蔬菜。

examination_example.sentence: We can give ourselves new challenges, meet new people, and <highlight>expose</highlight> our minds to new information, hobbies and skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以给自己新的挑战，认识新的人，让我们的思想接触到新的信息、爱好和技能。

sense_info_list.en: remove what is covering something so that it can be seen

examination_example.sentence: After being <highlight>exposed</highlight> (暴露) to air during digging, the coating under the paint began to fall off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在挖掘过程中暴露在空气中后，油漆下的涂层开始脱落。

examination_example.sentence: Geologists have identified almost 40 different layers of rock <highlight>exposed</highlight> by the rivers erosion．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地质学家已经发现了近40层不同的岩石因为河流的侵蚀而暴露出来。

examination_example.sentence: The World Animal Protection (WAP) says that up to 550,000 wild animals are <highlight>exposed</highlight> (暴露) to ill treatment around the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界动物保护组织(WAP)表示，全世界有多达55万只野生动物受到虐待。
